title: Strengthening App Development Practical Skills: Cognitive Load Management Strategies for Elementary Mathematics Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can reduce cognitive load by 20% when solving complex mathematical problems by utilizing pre-learning strategies.
Learners can perform step-by-step problem-solving processes with 80% accuracy by applying distributed learning strategies.
Learners can solve problems while maintaining a cognitive load scale of 4.2/7.0 or lower in a VR simulation environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
